message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating away at our potential gains.
Let's split it fairly, we both get a good amount, and we avoid further inflation losses.
Bob, my last offer was more than fair. I'm adjusting slightly due to inflation, but we need to settle this quickly before we both lose out even more.
Come on Alice, we're both losing out here. I'm willing to take a bit more to make up for my losses, but I'm still being fair.
